title: Securing Amazon Bedrock cross-Region inference: Geographic and global
summary: In this post, we explore the security considerations and best practices for implementing Amazon Bedrock cross-Region inference profiles. Whether you're building a generative AI application or need to meet specific regional compliance requirements, this guide will help you understand the secure architecture of Amazon Bedrock CRIS and how to properly configure your implementation.

light_analysis.summary: Amazon AWS 发布了一篇关于 Amazon Bedrock 跨区域推理安全性的技术指南，旨在帮助组织大规模实施生成式 AI 推理。文章介绍了两种跨区域推理类型：Geographic CRIS（地理跨区域推理）在指定地理区域内路由请求以符合数据驻留法规，而 Global CRIS（全局跨区域推理）在全球 AWS 商业区域中动态分配请求以提高吞吐量和成本效益。核心安全实践包括通过 IAM 策略和 SCPs 配置精细权限，确保数据在传输过程中加密且不存储在目标区域，同时支持审计日志记录在源区域。这些功能使企业能构建高响应性和可靠的 AI 应用，同时满足合规要求，并提供了与 AWS Control Tower 集成的进阶实施方法。

title: Zenken boosts a lean sales team with ChatGPT Enterprise
summary: By rolling out ChatGPT Enterprise company-wide, Zenken has boosted sales performance, cut preparation time, and increased proposal success rates. AI-supported workflows are helping a lean team deliver more personalized, effective customer engagement.
content: By rolling out ChatGPT Enterprise company-wide, Zenken has boosted sales performance, cut preparation time, and increased proposal success rates. AI-supported workflows are helping a lean team deliver more personalized, effective customer engagement.

light_analysis.summary: Zenken 公司通过在全公司范围内部署 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT Enterprise，显著优化了其销售团队的工作流程。这一举措帮助这个精简的销售团队提升了销售业绩，减少了准备时间，并提高了提案的成功率。AI 支持的工作流程使得团队能够实现更个性化和有效的客户互动，从而增强了整体销售效率。ChatGPT Enterprise 的应用不仅展示了 AI 在商业流程中的实用价值，还为其他企业提供了成功案例，证明 AI 工具可以助力团队在竞争环境中提高生产力和客户满意度。具体而言，通过自动化辅助和智能建议，销售团队能够更快速地响应客户需求，提升工作质量。
